metadata.title: CVE-2022-21694 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymouslyshare files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network.The website mode of the onionshare allows to use a hardened CSP, which willblock any scripts and external resources. It is not possible to configurethis CSP for individual pages and therefore the security enhancement cannotbe used for websites using javascript or external resources like fonts orimages.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
